# Playwright Framework for Midnight Society\n\nAutomated testing framework using Playwright with Page Object Model pattern.\n\n## Project Overview\n\nComplete Playwright framework for testing midnightsociety.com with:\n- Page Object Model pattern for maintainability\n- TypeScript for type safety\n- Cross-browser testing (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)\n- Mobile device testing support\n- Automatic screenshots and video capture\n- HTML reporting\n\n## Project Structure\n\n- **pages/** - Page Object classes (BasePage, HomePage, NavigationPage)\n- **tests/** - Test specifications\n- **playwright.config.ts** - Playwright configuration\n- **tsconfig.json** - TypeScript settings\n- **package.json** - Dependencies and scripts\n\n## Installation & Running Tests\n\n### Install Dependencies\n```bash\nnpm install\nnpx playwright install\n```\n\n### Run Tests\n```bash\nnpm test                 # Run all tests\nnpm run test:headed      # Run with visible browser\nnpm run test:ui          # Run with Playwright UI\nnpm run test:debug       # Debug mode\nnpm run report           # View HTML report\n```\n\n### Browser-Specific Tests\n```bash\nnpm run test:chrome      # Chromium only\nnpm run test:firefox     # Firefox only\nnpm run test:safari      # Safari only\n```\n\n## Key Features\n\n✅ **Page Object Model** - Organized, maintainable code structure\n✅ **BasePage Class** - Shared functionality for all pages\n✅ **TypeScript** - Full type safety and autocomplete\n✅ **Cross-Browser** - Test on multiple browsers simultaneously\n✅ **Responsive Testing** - Mobile and desktop viewports\n✅ **Auto Reports** - Screenshots and videos on failure\n✅ **Parallel Execution** - Run multiple tests concurrently\n\n## File Organization\n\n```\nproject/\n├── pages/\n│   ├── basePage.ts              # Base class with common methods\n│   ├── homePage.ts              # Home page specific methods\n│   └── navigationPage.ts        # Navigation/header methods\n├── tests/\n│   └── home.spec.ts             # Example test suite\n├── playwright.config.ts         # Framework configuration\n├── tsconfig.json                # TypeScript config\n├── package.json                 # Dependencies & scripts\n├── .env                         # Environment variables\n├── .gitignore                   # Git ignore rules\n└── README.md                    # Full documentation\n```\n\n## Test Strategy\n\n1. **HomePage Tests** - Verify home page loads and displays correctly\n2. **Navigation Tests** - Test header, menu, and navigation functionality\n3. **Responsive Tests** - Check mobile and desktop layouts\n4. **Integration Tests** - Verify page links and navigation flows\n\n## Adding New Tests\n\n1. Create page object in `pages/` for new pages\n2. Add test file in `tests/` directory\n3. Use existing page objects as examples\n4. Run `npm test` to execute\n\n## Configuration\n\n### Update Base URL\nEdit `playwright.config.ts` line with `baseURL`:\n```typescript\nbaseURL: 'https://www.midnightsociety.com'\n```\n\n### Add New Browser\nEdit `playwright.config.ts` projects array to add/remove browsers\n\n### Adjust Timeouts\nModify `use` section in `playwright.config.ts`\n\n## Debugging Tests\n\n```bash\n# Interactive debug mode\nnpm run test:debug\n\n# Run specific test file\nnpx playwright test tests/home.spec.ts\n\n# Run test matching name\nnpx playwright test -g \"should load home page\"\n\n# Generate test code from browser\nnpx playwright codegen https://www.midnightsociety.com\n```\n\n## Common Methods\n\n### Navigation\n```typescript\nawait homePage.navigateToHome();\nawait homePage.goto('/path');\n```\n\n### Element Interaction\n```typescript\nawait homePage.click(selector);\nawait homePage.fill(selector, 'text');\nawait homePage.clickLinkByText('Link Text');\n```\n\n### Verification\n```typescript\nconst isVisible = await homePage.isElementVisible(selector);\nconst text = await homePage.getText(selector);\nconst title = await homePage.getPageTitle();\n```\n\n### Waits\n```typescript\nawait homePage.waitForElement(selector);\nawait homePage.waitForPageLoad();\n```\n\n## Reporting\n\nTest reports include:\n- Test status and duration\n- Screenshots on failure\n- Video records of execution\n- Browser and OS details\n- Detailed error traces\n\nView reports:\n```bash\nnpm run report\n```\n\n## CI/CD Ready\n\nFramework is configured for:\n- GitHub Actions\n- Jenkins\n- GitLab CI\n- Azure Pipelines\n- Other CI/CD systems\n\nSet `CI` environment variable for CI mode.\n\n## Support\n\nFor issues:\n1. Check Playwright docs\n2. Review test reports for errors\n3. Use debug mode to inspect\n4. Check selector accuracy
